"Shahdeniz-2" is one of the world's largest energy projects. This project is the energy security and energy diversification project.
This historic project will provide greater co-operation among participating States and companies.
We have achieved this through the wisdom and vision of national leader Heydar Aliyev.
This project will change the energy map of the region and Europe and transport gas resources to the markets that are waiting for this wealth.
According to our calculations, Azerbaijan's gas reserves are about 3 trillion cubic meters.
$ 45 billion will be invested in the project, with more than 30,000 new jobs being set up across the country.
We are just at the start of a giant project that we are going to accomplish together.
I congratulate the Azerbaijani people on this historic day.
This project will ensure long-term and sustainable economic development of our country.
A record number of people, more than 30million, are in work. It's further proof that our #longtermplan for the economy is working.
Everyone coming to Britain should contribute. So from 1st Jan 2014, EU job-seekers will have to wait 3 months to claim out-of-work benefits.
BP and SOCAR have a 20-year cooperation experience. The agreements we have signed will last 40 years and (cont) http://t.co/DfUNJFCfyf
Azerbaijan's energy policy has enabled the transformation and diversification of our economy.
In the period when we regained our independence, the gross domestic product was equal to zero percent.
We are an example of how oil and gas serve the nation's interests. One of the main reasons for this was international cooperation.
We value this cooperation because the knowledge and experience of foreign companies are very important to us.
Today, this cooperation is entering into a wider format, and a new format of cooperation that will cover more countries and companies will be created.
In the future, the Shah Deniz-2 project will cover more geographical areas than it is currently planned.
Today, of course, we must focus our attention on the TANAP and TAP projects to deliver our gas to European markets in time.
Here are the countries involved in the initial phase of the Shah Deniz project - Azerbaijan, Georgia, Turkey, (cont) http://t.co/kkzFoNTc3S
We will start our active cooperation with Montenegro and Croatia. We also plan to extend the pipeline to the Balkans.
In the upcoming years, we will work to extend the pipeline in partnership with Romania, Hungary and Austria.
We have great plans, and the design of the pipeline is designed according to these plans.
In the future, we will transport the amount of gas we can produce through the proposed pipeline.
The Shah Deniz-2 project is a energy security project. The energy security of each country is inseparable from its national security.
One of the key elements of energy security is natural gas. This is the case and there will be no change in the next years.
For this reason, energy security and diversification of energy, as well as the producer country like Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/Ir5uban469
I am confident that we will be able to achieve the right balance of the interests of producers, transit and consumer countries.
Our energy strategy is based on friendship, cooperation and mutual support.
In our history, Azerbaijan has never used its energy potential for other purposes.
I congratulate the Azerbaijani people, all our friends and foreign partners on this historic day.
